components.name: MainLayout
components.description: Top-level page layout with header, calendar panel (left), and homework panel (right)

components.name: CalendarPanel
components.description: Weekly calendar container with week navigation (prev/next/today state transitions) and sync button

components.name: CalendarGrid
components.description: Weekly calendar grid showing 7 day columns (Sun-Sat) with events placed on correct days

components.name: CalendarEvent
components.description: Single event pill displayed inside a calendar day cell

components.name: SyncButton
components.description: Google Calendar sync button with loading/syncing state transition

components.name: HomeworkPanel
components.description: Right-side panel listing homework cards sorted by due date, with Add Source button

components.name: HomeworkCard
components.description: Individual homework card showing title, class (color dot), due date, and source link badge

components.name: AddSourceButton
components.description: Button that toggles a URL input popover for adding new crawl sources (open/closed state transition)
